channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ASML shares slide as chip-equipment giant says sales might not grow at all next year
item.description: ASML shares skidded on Wednesday after the microchip equipment maker warned sales might not grow at all next year.

item.title: Country music star Ella Langley buys a lakefront retreat in Alabama
item.description: Country icon Ella Langley has bought her first-ever home in the form of a lakefront retreat near her hometown of Montgomery, Alabama.

item.title: Buffalo Bills QB Josh Allen lists $8.5 million SoCal mansion after marrying actress Hailee Steinfeld
item.description: NFL star Josh Allen is selling his California bachelor pad for $8.5 million, just weeks after he and actress Hailee Steinfeld tied the knot.

item.title: Renault shares dive after French automaker issues profit warning
item.description: Renault shares fell 16% on Wednesday after the French automaker issued a profit warning that will lead to job cuts.

item.title: Mistral’s Voxtral goes beyond transcription with summarization, speech-triggered functions
item.description: Mistral's open-source speech model Voxtral can recognize multiple languages, understand spoken instructions and also offer enterprise security.

item.title: My daughter has $500K in med-school expenses. Can my wife and I afford to pay it off?
item.description: “Our annual income is $140,000. We are both on Medicare.”

item.title: Google study shows LLMs abandon correct answers under pressure, threatening multi-turn AI systems
item.description: A DeepMind study finds LLMs are both stubborn and easily swayed. This confidence paradox has key implications for building AI applications.

item.title: maxon Group acquires minority stake in Synapticon
item.description: The goal of the collaboration is to jointly develop high-performance drive solutions with integrated functional safety. The post maxon Group acquires ...

item.title: Finally, a dev kit for designing on-device, mobile AI apps is here: Liquid AI’s LEAP
item.description: LEAP addresses those needs head-on with a local-first approach that allows small models to run directly on-device, no cloud infrastructure.

item.title: Mira Murati says her startup Thinking Machines will release new product in ‘months’ with ‘significant open source component’
item.description: Backed by $2B and with OpenAI’s open-weight model now in limbo, Thinking Machines could capture developer attention and interest.
